sentences.en: Annotation: The act or process of furnishing critical commentary or explanatory notes.
sentences.cn: 注解: 评注性的解释或说明性的注释的行为或过程.

sentences.en: At that moment they might be furnishing the library with new books.
sentences.cn: 那时候他们也许在给图书馆提供新图书.

sentences.en: Bamboo products design, Zhuyun series on funiture and furnishing.
sentences.cn: “竹韵新语”系列,竹家具和竹家居用品设计.

sentences.en: But Ziro surrounded himself with the finest examples of furnishing anyway.
sentences.cn: 但是齐罗还是在身边堆满了最豪华的装饰.

sentences.en: By furnishing this Notice, the Company makes no admission of liability.
sentences.cn: 呈递此通知书, 并不表示保险公司承担赔偿责任.

sentences.en: His only crime consisted in furnishing us with provisions.
sentences.cn: 他唯一的罪名就是供给我们粮草罢了.

sentences.en: I was surprised by the rich furnishing of his place.
sentences.cn: 他家的奢华装修让我惊诧不已.

sentences.en: Liberty fabrics, both for furnishing and for dress-making, are sold by the metre.
sentences.cn: 利伯蒂布按米出售，既可用作装饰又可作衣料。

sentences.en: One such exquisite furnishing articles on your room, the indoor add vitality.
sentences.cn: 这样一款精美的摆件放在您的室内, 为室内增添了勃勃生机.

sentences.en: Thank you for furnishing me with so many data.
sentences.cn: 谢谢你供给我这么多的资料.

sentences.en: The firm won a contract for furnishing the army with boots.
sentences.cn: 这家公司得到一份合同为部队提供鞋靴.

sentences.en: The house has a high standard of luxury furnishing and decor.
sentences.cn: 这所房子的装饰和配置非常奢华.

sentences.en: These adjectives mean of, given to, or furnishing satisfaction of the senses.
sentences.cn: 这些形容词意为给予或提供感官的满足.

sentences.en: We should be grateful for your furnishing us details of your requirements.
sentences.cn: 如承赐示具体要求,不胜感激.

sentences.en: We will order some laths for furnishing the basement.
sentences.cn: 我们将订购一些木板条来装修地下室.

trans.tran_cn: 陈设，布置( furnish的现在分词 )，提供
